custom_css: .newsletter-form-group__input {margin: 0 auto; width: 100%; border-bottom-color: currentColor; border-radius: 0; padding-right: 45px; background-color: transparent; border-radius: 0px !important; color: #fff !important; -webkit-text-fill-color: #fff; border-bottom-width: 2px !important; padding: 8px 0;}
.newsletter-form-group__submit {position: absolute; top: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; color: #fff !important; padding-right: 0;}

settings.copyright_text: any illegal reproduction of this content will result in immediate legal action
